actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that persons employed in public service jobs shall not be paid at an annual rate exceeding $15,000.

summary.text: Revises the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to provide that persons employed in public service jobs shall not be paid at an annual rate exceeding $15,000 (presently $10,000).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that persons employed in public service jobs shall not be paid at an annual rate exceeding $15,000.
